org.apache.catalina.connector
Class ClientAbortException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.io.IOException
              org.apache.catalina.connector.ClientAbortException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class ClientAbortException
extends java.io.IOException

Wrap an IOException identifying it as being caused by an abort of a request by a remote client.

Version:
$Revision: 466595 $ $Date: 2006-10-21 18:24:41 -0400 (Sat, 21 Oct 2006) $
Author:
Glenn L. Nielsen
